title: 55. Your Skin Questions, Answered! Retinol Vs. Retinoids, SLS, More Tips for the Dreaded Macne, THE Best SPF, Treating Acne Types + Why a Face Mask Is Not the Cure
description:
Thank you to the sponsors of our podcast!

Check out our favorite intermittent fasting tool: Fastic App. You can download the app for free on Apple App Store or Google Play.

Hi Roomies!! It's a solo episode with Tess today. Today I'm answering your questions-- including how to treat jawline congestion, whiteheads and cystic acne, how to use retinol, vitamin c for all skin types, whetehr face masks are worth it, differences between retinol and retinoids, tips to prevent/ treat mask acne, SLS potential risks, my favorite sunscreen, and tips for sensitive skin.

If you find value in this episode it would mean so much if you left  us a 5 star review on iTunes-- it helps other professionals find us and  appreciate us as credible sources.

Slip Silk Mask

Link: https://bit.ly/3lajbpR

Code: TESS for 25% off

(please note this is an affiliate like for which I receive a small % from your purchase. I appreciate the support!)

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly 

Tess' TikTok: @myestytessa

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics + Lauren's YouTube: Lauren Kruger

Lauren's Blog: www.lauren-kruger.com

Music by LiQwYd https://soundcloud.com/liqwyd
